data.eml:eml: Redescription of Platygyndes Roewer 1943, a false Gonyleptidae, (Arachnida, Opiliones, Cosmetidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo, Hara, Marcos Ryotaro (2011): Redescription of Platygyndes Roewer 1943, a false Gonyleptidae, (Arachnida, Opiliones, Cosmetidae). ZooKeys 143: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.143.1916, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.143.1916
